content: To enable dark mode application-wide, simply add the `dark` class to your root element (e.g., `<html>` or `<body>`). For dynamic theme switching, a library is recommended.

For Next.js applications, the `next-themes` library is recommended. Install it, wrap your app in its `ThemeProvider`, and then use a switcher component to toggle themes. The provider setup varies slightly between the App and Pages directories.
For Vite or Create React App projects, you can use the `@heroui/use-theme` hook. Install the package and use the `useTheme` hook in a component to get and set the current theme.
